alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 2:25PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible overnight. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect heavy snow showers this afternoon with a more widespread snow developing tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
